title: Question: When will the Vayne Chroma be available?
body: Hey random post, just wondering when the chromas usually launch after the patch comes in. Thanks!

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Content, including chromas, will come out throughout the patch, as opposed to all at once. Unfortunately, we don't announce these dates in advance. Dragonslayed Vayne chromas will be out later this patch (5.15).
Alright thanks! Can't wait to roll around into the middle of the enemy teams as a red dragon :D
